result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu Má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: This was the last operation of its kind we will see.
result.ga: Ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muid
result.orig: Ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muid
result.html: Ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muidThis was the last operation of its kind we will see.
result.ponchtml: Ba é seo an obráid ḋeireanaċ dá cineál a ḟeicfiḋ muidThis was the last operation of its kind we will see.

result.eng: I regret very much that I never saw the play.
result.ga: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamh
result.orig: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamh
result.html: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamhI regret very much that I never saw the play.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an trua dom naċ ḃfaca mé an dráma riaṁI regret very much that I never saw the play.

result.eng: All you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ga: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.html: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobhAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ le feiceáil ar an túr aċ poll mór ina ṫaoḃAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.

result.eng: This was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ga: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.orig: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.html: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a ḃfeictear na mílte saiġdiúirí Meiriceánaċa gaċ lá anois ar a mbealaċ ċun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.html: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndoṁan nua anois a ḃuíoċas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórṫa eile naċ ḃfuil ann níos mó ċun é a ḟeiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.

result.eng: My daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ga: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.orig: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.html: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ponchtml: Meaḃrú laeṫúil ó ẛin dom ar na huafáis a ċonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.

result.eng: The horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ga: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.orig: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.html: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibhThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ponchtml: Na huafáis a ċonaiceamar uafáis naċ n-oireann focla dóiḃThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: As an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san Eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: Come here and take a look at her.
result.ga: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.orig: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.html: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ anseo go ḃfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
